prompts.title: Brainstorm business ideas
prompts.prompt: Help me brainstorm 5 innovative business ideas in the sustainable energy sector, including potential challenges and how to overcome them.

prompts.title: Plan a workout routine
prompts.prompt: Create a beginner-friendly 4-week workout routine focused on building strength and endurance, with exercises I can do at home without equipment.

prompts.title: Learn a new language
prompts.prompt: Teach me basic Spanish phrases for traveling, starting with greetings, ordering food, and asking for directions. Include pronunciation guides.

prompts.title: Recipe suggestions
prompts.prompt: Suggest three easy vegetarian dinner recipes using common pantry ingredients like rice, beans, and vegetables. Include step-by-step instructions.

prompts.title: Productivity hacks
prompts.prompt: Share 10 productivity hacks for remote workers, focusing on time management, minimizing distractions, and maintaining work-life balance.

prompts.title: Explain quantum computing
prompts.prompt: Explain quantum computing in simple terms for someone with no background in physics. What makes it different from classical computing?

prompts.title: Write a short story
prompts.prompt: Write a short sci-fi story about a world where dreams can be traded like currency. Keep it under 500 words.

prompts.title: Travel itinerary
prompts.prompt: Plan a 7-day itinerary for a trip to Tokyo, including must-see sights, local food recommendations, and budget tips.

prompts.title: Debug code
prompts.prompt: Help me debug this Python code snippet that's giving an error: print('Hello' + 5). Explain what's wrong and how to fix it.

prompts.title: Motivational advice
prompts.prompt: Give me motivational advice for overcoming fear of failure when starting a new project. Include real-life examples.
